name: 王正豪
objective: 本課程之設計，在介紹資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。課程內容包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
schedule:
0. Ch.1 Introduction (1 wk)
1. Cryptography: Ch. 2-3 (4 wks)
- Symmetric encryption and message confidentiality
- Public-key cryptography and message authentication 
2. Network security applications: Ch. 4-8 (6 wks)
- Key distribution and user authentication
- Transport-level security
- Wireless network security
- Electronic mail security
- IP security
3. Midterm Exam (1 wk)
4. System security: Ch. 9-11 (3 wks)
- Intruders
- Malicious software
- Firewalls
5. Term project presentation (3 wks)
scorePolicy:
Written homeworks: ~30%
Midterm exam and quiz: ~35%
Term  projection: ~35%
materials:
- Textbook: . Cryptography and Network Security: Principles and Practice, seventh Edition, by William Stallings, Prentice-Hall, 2017. (Global Edition, 開發)

- References: Network Security Essentials: Applications and Standards, 6th ed., by William Stallings, Pearson Education, Inc., 2016. (Currently not available in Taiwan)

. Some slides and papers
